divs: Sighting DetailsI was taking the dog for a walk down my driveway approximately 10:30 P.M. when I heard what I thought was a jet engine overhead. I looked up and saw what appeared to be a large plane of some kind with 5 or 6 red lights that would flash in unison. I couldn't see the outline of the plane, just the lights. The lights were in the shape of a check mark. At first I thought it was a B-2 bomber and then I thought it was too big for a B-2. Then I thought maybe a squadron of planes but the lights blinked in unison? It went from north to south in a straight line at a fairly slow speed. It probably took 3 or 4 minutes to travel out of sight. Afterwards I thought maybe a lighter than air ship, blimp of some kind. I got the feeling that it was one of ours. Didn't feel like I had seen something extraterrestrial.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Acton
There were no other sightings in Acton on or around March 28th 2008
Summary: 5 or 6 red lights and loud hum of engines
